activities: Zanbato collects two types of information from the EU: a) Personally Identifiable information and b) General user information that is not personally identifiable, and is collected on an aggregated basis. Personally identifiable information collected includes an individual's name, email address, phone number and employer. Any user may also provide Zanbato with a personal description and information on his or her employer's investment preferences. Zanbato uses this information to create connectivity among investors in the alternative assets space in a secure and private environment. All data provided by users to Zanbato is stored on secure servers hosted by Amazon Web Services and is only deleted if specifically requested by an individual or organization. Zanbato will only disclose information about European users to third parties after gaining consent from the users themselves.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
